content.text: Linked content blocks allow you to quickly populate your changelog from the recently completed work. Annotations show you which issues and pull requests are linked to features. There are blocks for showing rich content about a new feature, and for quickly building a list of small improvements and bug fixes.
Linked content blocks can be created while in the editor, or better, by using our new and improved
You can now group related issues and pull requests and link them to the same content in your changelog. This is really handy when you have multiple pieces of work which contributed to a new feature.
We’re working on some great new features around planning and populating your changelogs,
to stay up to date with the latest.

title: Linked Content Blocks
headline: Linked content blocks allow you to populate your content from the recently completed work. Annotations show you which issues and pull requests are linked.

content.text: Changelog planning just got way simpler!
We could not be more excited to announce this feature 📣  This was born through our own use of the product after we integrated with GitHub.  Once you integrate an issue or code system you will see
populated with your recently completed issues or closed PRs.  The idea 💡 here is pretty simple, and fun 🕺🏻, any item that is completed will show up for a decision.  Is this
( should be included at some point ) or
( doesn’t need to be announced ), that’s it.  Once you do that you can begin grouping items and moving them to
While you are moving things around you can have discussions with your teams about certain items by using comments.  Simply click the
💬 icon to start a dialogue and that conversation will follow the card throughout the app.  Once you are ready to
column and a new changelog will be created and is ready for you to update and publish.
you will now see that there is nothing under

items are flagged and hidden upon creation of a new changelog and if an item is added to a changelog it is now linked to it.  Don’t worry if you end up removing a linked item it will move back to the appropriate column when you return to
Give it a shot and let us know what you think, it’s been a gamechanger for us and we are excited to see how it helps you build beautiful changelogs in less time.

site.name: Pinpoint
site.mailingAddress: 3131 McKinney Ave Ste 502 PMB 98116 Dallas, Texas 75204-2426 US

theme.title: Pinpoint Changelog
theme.description: New updates and improvements to Pinpoint

content.text: Email validation, filtering, and subscriber search 🔍

As new users subscribe to your changelog you will be able to quickly see if they have verified and validated their email addresses with you.  Along with this you also now have the ability to search your subscriber list.  This will help you ensure your list data stays clean.  If you are a Mailchimp user you can also sync any list you’d like to Changelog and we will keep everything in sync for you.  A more detailed changelog to come for this amazing capability!

In the first small step to improved publishing, you can now decide if you want to notify your subscribers on publishing.  This will give you the ability to publish silently and notify on your own timing.  Lots more planned for the publishing dialogue with things like scheduled publishing and automated summary notifications and more.
Fixes the breadcrumb so clicking on steps in the map filter is more intuitive
Use query params for pagination to improve SEO

content.text: We have now added drill-down analytics to give you even deeper insight into where your changelogs are having the most impact.  Check out the video below to learn more, or better yet sign up for your own changelog site and start letting people know what you are up to!
Dates and times localized to you!

Timezones and dates, in general, can be tricky to work with but we think we have it figured out now and you are the beneficiary 🙂 as you can see below Chicago (left) vs London (right) shows the same time frame but the days are labeled differently
and the same for 2 weeks, etc:
Support rewriting URLs when you change the site slug or if you go to the site slug and you have a hostname configured

theme.title: Pinpoint Changelog
theme.description: New updates and improvements to Pinpoint

content.text: If you are lucky 🍀 enough to have tried our integrations we will now identify a PR or issue that has previously been mentioned in a changelog entry.  Maybe you want to mention it again, your call but we wanted to make sure you knew 😉

We have a little secret for you too 🤫… our next changelog is going to introduce a feature that will shave MINUTES off changelog creation and allow you to do it in a highly organized fashion.  It’s also been a lot of fun to use in testing!
Our tooltip charts left a bit to be desired so we tidied them up a bit 🧹

title: Already mentioned notice
headline: If you are lucky 🍀 enough to have tried our integrations we will now identify a PR or issue that has previously been mentioned in a changelog entry.  Maybe you want to mention it again, your call but we wanted to make sure you knew 😉...

site.name: Pinpoint
site.mailingAddress: 3131 McKinney Ave Ste 502 PMB 98116 Dallas, Texas 75204-2426 US

theme.title: Pinpoint Changelog
theme.description: New updates and improvements to Pinpoint

content.text: Users can now search your public changelog with ease.  Searches are lightning quick ⚡️ too!

Published changelogs now also support tag 🏷 clicking to filter the results.  Any tag you create will allow users to click and filter against one or many tags.  This allows visitors of your changelog to engage with all of your content not just the most recent entry.

There are a couple of improvements and bug fixes on the subscribers page.  We have fixed the issue where selecting skip verifications wasn’t working properly.  You now also have a handy UI interface to allow you to more easily manage your subscriber list.
YouTube videos now have the player embedded so users can interact with them directly on a published changelog.

title: Published Page Search and Filtering
headline: Users can now search your public changelog with ease.  Searches are lightning quick ⚡️ too!

Fix Cut Off Highlight on Changelog Action Menu
